name: TwoSideGravity
description:
TwoSideGravity started as a parody to the famous "circle game" which has been used on memes lately , so i decided to make something simple yet relatable to the topic (circle game meme).

there are 2 kind of "endings" the first one happens once you touch the "circle " enemy which triggers a photo of a meme which symbolizes a game over screen , the same happends when you fall over a cliff , but instead of showing a meme it shows a picture of your character  falling down the cliff

****IMPORTANT****

once you get a game over you'll need to click and hold for about 3 seconds to restart the game.
